title: The New Superheros (feat. Justin Silver)
description:
The Beastmaster Justin Silver joins The Bonfire and comes in and tells the gang about his salacious summer camp experience and the guys get into a conversation about the new gay superheros!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com

@IAmJustinSilver www.IAmJustinSilver.com
